name: Covid Run (Emzzy'sDynasty)
description:
Get ready for this as Emzzy'sDynasty is about to blow you away with an amazing game called....... Covid Run. In here you are to dodge the nasty covid monsters as they come close to you, and that's not all you can also pick up some coins as a reward for doing that ... We @Emzzy'sDynasty hope you have some fun. 

Thank you for checking out our game... For more exciting fun filled games, be sure to stay in touch with our team @Emzzy'sDynasty via 

Discord server: https://discord.gg/xquyDdJa

Instagram: Emzzy'sDynasty

Facebook: Emzzy'sDynasty

Youtube: Emzzy'sDynasty

Thank You very much for your time

Courtesy: EmzzyGroup
